brutal : arm

PIE √bheH2- ‘to strike’ (a scarcely attested root)
IEW 111–12 *bhāt-, *bhāu- ‘schlagen, stoßen’ Hurrian βah- ‘to destroy’ (BGH 286–87)
Cf. Substratic Armenian բախել baḫ-el ‘to strike, beat’

𒁕𒆪 da-ku tög > düg > döymək “beat (up)” @ Turk
